name: convention
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: convention
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a large formal meeting of people who do a particular job or have a similar interest, or a large meeting for a political party

example.eg: Where are they holding their party convention?
example.egtrans: 他们在哪里召开党员大会？

dsense.name: convention
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a usual or accepted way of behaving, especially in social situations, often following an old way of thinking or a custom in one particular society
trans_examp.trans_cn: 传统；（尤指社会）习俗，常规，惯例

example.eg: They defied/flouted/broke with convention by giving up their jobs and becoming self-sufficient.
example.egtrans: 他们离经叛道，放弃了工作，开始过自给自足的生活。

example.eg: Convention dictates that it is the man who asks the woman to marry him and not the other way round.
example.egtrans: 根据习俗，应由男人向女人求婚而不是反过来。

example.eg: In many countries it is the/a convention to wear black at funerals.
example.egtrans: 在葬礼上穿黑色的衣服是许多国家的习俗。

trans_examp.trans_en: a common way of showing something in art or writing

dsense.name: convention
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a formal agreement between country leaders, politicians, and states on a matter that involves them all
